attributes.action: The Government must be held to account
attributes.additional_details:
Promises were made to protect our borders, to stop illegal immigration and to address and control crime especially on our streets however, other than reteric, nothing has been done and matters are getting worse.

If our Government and it's Ministers are unable to sort these matters out they must be removed and if needs be the Government dissolved and a general election called.
attributes.background: Promises made regarding illegal immighration, crime etc are not being kept and so the Government and individual Ministers must be help to account and this blatant ignoring of the people who voted for them stopped.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 
	
We're not exactly sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
